description: Allows Equine mobs to be Horse Traps and be triggered like them, spawning a lightning bolt and a bunch of horses when a player is nearby. Can only be used by Horses, Mules, Donkeys and Skeleton Horses.

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that the player has to be within to trigger the horse trap.

duration.description: Amount of time in seconds the trap exists. After this amount of time is elapsed, the trap is removed from the world if it hasn't been activated.
